translation.en: [woman] Ladies and gentlemen, we are live at the grand opening
translation.fr:
Mesdames et messieurs,
nous sommes en direct à l'inauguration

translation.en: of Ishaya Bello's first art exhibition.
translation.fr: de la première exposition d'Ishaya Bello.

translation.en: [Ishaya] Thank you.
Thank you all for coming.
Who would have thought that the dreams of a young boy… [in Yoruba] …from Lagos Island would become this?
translation.fr:
Qui aurait cru que les rêves d'un garçon
de Lagos se réaliseraient ?

translation.en: I always dreamt of being an artist, of being Essien,
translation.fr:
J'ai toujours rêvé d'être un artiste,
d'être Essien.

translation.en: and I got a chance to work with him as an apprentice in London,
translation.fr:
J'ai eu la chance
d'être son apprenti à Londres

translation.en: and, boy, he changed my life.
translation.fr: et il a changé ma vie.

translation.en: Thank you, Essien.
Also I'd like to thank my friends.
[woman] Ishaya.
Ishaya, wake up!
You're late for work. Mum is waiting outside. She's very angry.
translation.fr:
Tu es en retard.
Maman t'attend. Elle est furax.

translation.en: Shit.
-Shit, shit, shit! -[expectant music playing]
[Patricia in Yoruba] Ishaya, we are already late. Will you stop dragging your feet?
translation.fr:
Ishaya, on est déjà en retard.
Arrête de traîner comme ça.

translation.en: Hello.
Who are you again?
I'm the cleaner, sir.
Madam Patricia's son.
Sister, fine drawing for your wall, ma, for your wall.
translation.fr: Ma sœur, un beau dessin pour ton mur.

translation.en: -I painted it myself, it's original. Ma! -[woman] I don't want.
translation.fr: Je l'ai peint moi-même, c'est un original.

translation.en: [Ishaya] Mama, do you like paintings?
Mama, painting for your fine wall in your house.
translation.fr: Un tableau pour ton beau mur !

translation.en: I painted it by myself, ma. It's a fine work.
translation.fr:
Je l'ai peint moi-même.
Du beau travail.

translation.en: Sir, you can buy this drawing. I drew it myself.
It's original work from me, sir! Sir!
translation.fr: Une œuvre originale de moi. Monsieur !

translation.en: Sir! Daddy, help me now.
[Michael in Pidgin] Why are you so eager to sell your art?
translation.fr: Pourquoi tu veux tant vendre ton art ?

translation.en: I need money quickly.
[in English] Money for what?
Ishaya.
[in Pidgin] What's going on?
[in English] Nothing.
[in Pidgin] Have you got someone pregnant? You'll get someone pregnant, idiot.
translation.fr:
- Tu as mis une fille en cloque ?
- C'est toi qui vas le faire.

translation.en: Okay, talk to me, what's going on?
Tell me.
[in English] You know that…
[in Pidgin] That artist from London?
Essien, your role model.
Essien. He has this art fellowship…
to study with him for six months.
translation.fr: pour étudier avec lui pendant six mois.

translation.en: I applied.
You applied?
He picked me.
-[in English] Yeah? -I swear.
He actually picked me.
[in Pidgin] Don't lie. Let me see your face. You're lying.
translation.fr: Fais voir ton visage. Tu mens.

translation.en: Why would I lie?
I said he picked… Come see the video.
translation.fr: Tu n'as qu'à regarder la vidéo.

translation.en: [Michael] No way.
[in English] Dear Ishaya, if you're watching this video…
translation.fr:
Cher Ishaya, - si vous regardez ceci…
- Regarde.

translation.en: [in English] …then congratulations.
You have been selected as one of my apprentices in London.
translation.fr:
Vous avez été choisi
comme apprenti à Londres.

translation.en: You'll get the required training, expertise,
translation.fr:
Vous recevrez la formation
pour acquérir l'expertise et les contacts

translation.en: and exposure to start your career
on the global stage.
[in Pidgin] Wow, my guy, you did it!
-How come you didn't tell me? -Shh! Quiet.
-You're traveling to London? -That's what I'm trying to arrange.
translation.fr: Tu vas à Londres ? Je cherche un moyen.

translation.en: Before you say "Queen Elizabeth", you'll be in London sipping tea with her.
translation.fr:
En un clin d'œil, tu prendras le thé
à Londres avec la reine.

translation.en: Queen Elizabeth. Queen Elizabeth. Am I in London now?
translation.fr:
Un clin d'œil, deux clins d'œil.
Je suis à Londres ?

translation.en: [Michael] Calm down. You'll go to London.
translation.fr: Du calme. Tu iras à Londres.

translation.en: My clients will buy your artwork.
-[Ishaya] Upfront. -Upfront. Before!
Let me take a bath and get ready for Rahila's birthday party.
translation.fr:
Je vais me préparer
pour l'anniversaire de Rahila.

translation.en: -What? -[Ishaya] Shit, I haven't bought the cake.
-What? -[Ishaya] Shit, shit, shit.
This guy…
-[in English] What are you doing here? -Go and sit down.
translation.fr: Que fais-tu ici ? Va donc t'asseoir.

translation.en: [in Pidgin] Rahila, your cake is here.
-[Ishaya in English] Babe! -[Michael] Happy birthday!
Hi! Wait till you see what I got.
I bought it for Rahila.
-[in Pidgin] What is this? -Come on, Ishaya.
translation.fr: C'est quoi ? C'est à la mode.

translation.en: [in Pidgin] So she will attract friends.
I don't want these for her, looks like clothes for a prostitute.
translation.fr: On dirait des vêtements de prostituée.

translation.en: -It's not bad, I like it. -I know you'll like this. Naughty!
translation.fr:
Ça me plaît, à moi. - Je sais que ça te plaît. Vaurien !
- Merci.

translation.en: -[in English] Thank you. -[both muttering and laughing]
translation.fr:
- Je sais que ça te plaît. Vaurien !
- Merci.

translation.en: Good day sir.
[Adufe] Let's play.
All right, come and eat.
Are you OK? [in Yoruba] Want to go to the bedroom?
translation.fr: Ça va ? Tu veux aller dans la chambre ?

translation.en: [Adufe in English] Rahila, your dream school advert is on.
translation.fr: Rahila, la pub pour l'école de tes rêves.

translation.en: [woman on TV] At Wilmer Academy,
we are all about giving back to the society that raised us.
translation.fr:
nous voulons rendre
à la société qui nous a élevés.

translation.en: Do you want to win a scholarship to the most prestigious School in Nigeria?
translation.fr:
Voulez-vous gagner une bourse pour l'école
la plus prestigieuse du Nigeria ?

translation.en: For those of you who want to come to Wilmer Academy, here's your chance.
translation.fr:
Pour ceux qui veulent étudier
à la Wilmer Academy, voici votre chance.

translation.en: Come to the Wilmer Academy Open Day and register for the scholarship exam,
translation.fr:
Venez à notre journée portes ouvertes pour vous inscrire pour l'examen d'entrée
et vous serez peut-être…

translation.en: and maybe you'll be the--
translation.fr:
pour vous inscrire pour l'examen d'entrée
et vous serez peut-être…

translation.en: Hey, now, Mummy, I was watching it!
[in Yoruba] Don't waste your time. Attending that school is a futile dream.
translation.fr: Tu perds ton temps. Aller à cette école est un rêve futile.

translation.en: You hear me?
[in English] My dear daughter, today's your birthday, hmm?
translation.fr: Ma chère fille, c'est ton anniversaire.

translation.en: Let's be merry.
[in Yoruba] Did you hear? Don't frown.
translation.fr: Soyons joyeux. Ne fais pas la tête.

translation.en: Go and eat.
[in English] Birthday girl.
[Michael in Pidgin] Smile. That looks…
Thank you.
[in Pidgin] You know I can't draw your dream every day.
translation.fr:
Je peux pas dessiner ton rêve
tous les jours.

translation.en: [in English] Chase it now so you don't regret it later.
translation.fr: Poursuis-le ou tu vas le regretter.

translation.en: My dreams are too expensive. Plus, I don't even think I belong there.
translation.fr:
Mes rêves coûtent trop cher.
En plus, je n'ai pas ma place là-bas.

translation.en: Unrealistic dreams are destructive.
-Know what I think? -What?
translation.fr:
- Tu sais ce que je pense ?
- Quoi ?

translation.en: [in Pidgin] Tomorrow is their Open Day, right?
translation.fr:
Demain,
c'est la journée portes ouvertes.

translation.en: -[in English] Go there. -Hmm?
Register for the scholarship exam. I mean, you never know.
translation.fr:
Inscris-toi pour l'examen d'entrée.
On ne sait jamais.

translation.en: [in Yoruba] Shame.
[in English] Will you follow me?
[in Yoruba] I'm busy, please.
[in English] Please, now.
Look, I'm too busy following my own dreams. [in Yoruba] Did you hear?
translation.fr:
Je suis trop occupé
à suivre mes propres rêves.

translation.en: [in English] Okay, I'll follow you.
[in Pidgin] Don't you have a shirt? Why are you wearing that shirt?
[in Yoruba] Are you now ashamed of where Lagos Island?
translation.fr: Tu as honte d'où on vient ?

translation.en: [in English] Let's go.
[in Yoruba] Please leave me alone.
-[car honking] -[Ishaya] Lala!
[in Yoruba] Gutter trash who've never seen wealth before.
translation.fr:
Des ordures
qui n'ont jamais vu la richesse.

translation.en: [in Pidgin] Riff-raff. Drive on.
[in Yoruba] Just look at them. Rubbish.
Didn't I tell you not to wear this shirt?
translation.fr: Je t'avais dit d'éviter cette chemise.

translation.en: [woman in English] Welcome.
I'd like to sign up for the scholarship exam.
Fill this form.
Pay the registration fee of 150,000 naira.
translation.fr:
Les frais d'inscription
sont de 150 000 nairas.

translation.en: 150,000? For a scholarship exam?
The entry exam is not free. But it is a scholarship.
translation.fr:
- L'examen n'est pas gratuit.
- Mais c'est une bourse.

translation.en: Don't you want to give it to someone that can't actually afford to pay?
translation.fr:
Pour quelqu'un
qui n'a pas les moyens de payer.

translation.en: Can she write the exam now and pay for it later when she gets the scholarship?
translation.fr:
Elle peut passer l'examen
et payer quand elle aura la bourse ?

translation.en: [woman] This is Wilmer Academy… [in Yoruba] …not Lagos Island Secondary School.
translation.fr:
C'est la Wilmer Academy,
pas le lycée public.

translation.en: [in English] It's fine, Lala. Let's go.
Let's go.
You look absolutely ravishing.
Your smile lights up the entire room.
-[scoffs] Please, sit down. -Thank you.
[Rahila] Dreaming is destructive.
My dreams are unrealistic. [Ishaya] Lala, that doesn't even make sense.
translation.fr:
- Mes rêves sont irréalistes.
- Ça n'a aucun sens.

translation.en: No, look at Daddy.
[in Pidgin] Dad wanting to be a famous artist lost us our brother.
translation.fr:
Son rêve d'être un artiste célèbre
nous a fait perdre notre frère.

translation.en: Now he's in pain every time.
[in English] Maybe Daddy will actually stop being in pain if he starts doing what he loves, just painting.
translation.fr:
Peut-être que papa arrêtera de souffrir
s'il fait ce qu'il aime : peindre.

translation.en: That's why, me, I'm chasing my dream.
translation.fr: C'est pour ça que je poursuis mon rêve.

translation.en: Lala, just because you can't get into Wilmer
translation.fr:
Ce n'est pas parce que
tu ne vas pas à la Wilmer Academy

translation.en: doesn't mean you can't be the neuro…
translation.fr: que tu ne peux pas être neuro…

translation.en: whatever doctor you decide you want to be. Wilmer is not the only school in Lagos.
translation.fr:
Enfin, le docteur que tu veux être.
Wilmer n'est pas la seule école.

translation.en: It's neurosurgeon. You shut up your dirty mouth.
translation.fr:
- Neurochirurgienne.
- Ne dis pas de gros mots.

translation.en: [in Yoruba] What did he do?
[in English] He broke my number-one rule.
translation.fr: Elle a enfreint la règle d'or.

translation.en: Got high on my supply.
translation.fr: Il s'est défoncé avec ma marchandise.

translation.en: [in Yoruba] That's a serious offense.
Baido, feed him to Angel.
[man] Baido, feed him to Angel.
[in English] Joe.
Sir, um…
[in Pidgin] The weed is selling, but…
this medicine is not.
[in English] Molly or ecstasy, Joe.
[in Pidgin] You need to know the name.
translation.fr:
Tu en vendras pas
si tu sais pas le nom.

translation.en: [in English] Ijoba, Rush is our business.
translation.fr: Ijoba. La défonce, c'est notre business.

translation.en: [in Yoruba] Why are you selling pills? [in English] We need to diversify.
translation.fr:
- Pourquoi des cachets ?
- Il faut se diversifier.

translation.en: This will attract rich young people.
[in Pidgin] You and I know this business is not new.
[Ijoba in English] I will continue to develop new markets.
[in Yoruba] You're losing your mind, Government.
[in English] Sell the pills, Joe, or don't come back.
translation.fr: Vends les cachets, Joe, ou ne reviens pas.

translation.en: What?
My salary, sir.
[Patricia in Yoruba] He's still in pain.
[nurse on phone] Bring him in. [in English] But you have to pay your bills before we treat him.
translation.fr:
Faites-le venir. Mais il faut payer
avant qu'on ne le soigne.

translation.en: [man groans in English] Oh, no.
Pick up, now.
[neighbor in Yoruba] Sorry about your dad.
[Ishaya in English] Daddy! Mummy! Lala!
It's still the same pain,
but it was worse this time around, so we had to rush him to the hospital.
translation.fr:
mais pire, cette fois.
On a dû l'emmener à l'hôpital.

translation.en: [Ishaya in Yoruba] Why didn't you call me? [Rahila in English] You didn't pick up.
translation.fr:
- Pourquoi tu m'as pas appelé ?
- Tu n'as pas décroché.

translation.en: [Ishaya] How much do we owe the hospital now?
[in Yoruba] Speak up.
[Patricia in English] Ishaya…
The medicine they said we should buy for your father, that we couldn't afford…
translation.fr:
Les médicaments pour ton père,
ceux qui étaient trop chers,

translation.en: I've bought them.
And the remaining money, we'll use it for our house rent.
translation.fr:
On utilisera
l'argent restant pour le loyer.

translation.en: Mummy, please give me back my money.
Mummy, this is the money for the apprenticeship in London.
translation.fr:
C'est l'argent pour ma formation
à Londres.

translation.en: The money I need to use to travel. Mummy, please, just give me back the rest of my money. Please.
translation.fr:
J'en ai besoin pour le voyage.
Rends-moi le reste. S'il te plaît.

translation.en: Ishaya, you are wicked.
With all we are going through in this family,
translation.fr:
Avec tout ce qu'on traverse,
tu veux voyager ?

translation.en: -you want to travel? -Please.
translation.fr:
Avec tout ce qu'on traverse,
tu veux voyager ? - S'il te plaît.
- Où ça ?

translation.en: -To where? -London.
translation.fr:
- S'il te plaît.
- Où ça ? - Londres.
- Pour quoi ? Dessiner ?

translation.en: To do what? Draw?
[in Yoruba] The devil's work!
[in Pidgin] Isn't it the same evil money you are using to treat him?
translation.fr:
Tu te sers bien de l'argent
pour le soigner !

translation.en: -Give me my money. -[in Yoruba] How dare you talk that way!
[in English] Give back my money!
[softly] Take it easy.
[Ishaya] It's for three months now! Just three months! [in Yoruba] Get out of my sight.
translation.fr:
- Ce n'est que pour trois mois.
- Hors de ma vue.

translation.en: [in Pidgin] Lala, you did this to me?
translation.fr: Lala, c'est toi qui m'as fait ça ?

translation.en: Why did the ambulance come?
[Michael in Pidgin] Who's that? How are you, Adufe?
translation.fr:
- Qui c'est ?
- Comment ça va, Adufe ?

translation.en: [Adufe] I'm fine, how are you?
[in English] Rahila told me what happened.
I'm sorry.
[Michael in Pidgin] How would you go about it?
I will go to London.
London? Osapa London in Lekki?
translation.fr: Londres ? Tu parles du quartier de Lekki ?

translation.en: My guy, you must be kidding.
You neither have a passport nor visa…
translation.fr: Tu n'as ni passeport ni visa.

translation.en: And you don't even have enough for the ticket yet.
translation.fr: Et tu n'as même pas assez pour le billet.

translation.en: [scoffs] I'll find a way.
translation.fr: Et tu n'as même pas assez pour le billet. Je trouverai un moyen.

translation.en: I'm not going to end up like my father, sad because I have forsaken my dreams.
translation.fr:
Je finirai pas comme mon père,
triste car il a abandonné ses rêves.

translation.en: Look at Essien.
He saw my work, liked it, and chose me.
translation.fr:
Il a vu mon travail,
il a aimé et m'a choisi.

translation.en: [Adufe] Ishaya…
You're planning to leave the country and didn't tell me?
translation.fr:
Tu allais quitter le pays
sans me prévenir ?

translation.en: I thought we would get married.
-I can't marry anybody like this. -"Anybody"?
translation.fr:
- Je peux pas épouser qui que ce soit.
- Comment ça ?

translation.en: [scoffs] I have to succeed first. So I'm anybody?
translation.fr:
- Je dois me faire connaître.
- Et moi, je compte pas ?

translation.en: Babe, that's not what I said.
-I didn't mean it that way. -Bless you.
translation.fr:
- Je voulais pas dire ça.
- Bonne chance.

translation.en: [in English] Babe…
Adufe…
Oga Rambo wants to see you in his VIP spot.
translation.fr: Le patron veut te voir dans son bureau.

translation.en: [man in Yoruba] Yo, Oluwadollar.
What the king doesn't have…
translation.fr: Ce que le roi n'a pas…

translation.en: he wants.
What does the queen want?
[in English] Open it.
[in Yoruba] Are you deaf?
[in English] Open it!
[in Yoruba] Move it.
[in English] Yes, sir.
[in Yoruba] Ishaya, get up.
Time to go to work.
Check out this gold bracelet
and her choke necklace.
[in Pidgin] Don't choke her too much.
translation.fr:
Ne la gâte pas trop,
elle en voudra toujours plus.

translation.en: [in Yoruba] Hey, boy, change some dollars for me, I need more money, okay?
translation.fr: Je veux changer mes dollars en nairas.

translation.en: [in Pidgin] Check that place for the money.
[man 1 in Yoruba] Bring me this money. It'd better be complete.
[man 2] No sleep for strippers. [man 1] Dollar does not depreciate, yeah.
translation.fr:
Les strip-teaseuses en redemandent.
Le dollar vaut de l'or.

translation.en: [Oga Rambo] Dollar Boy! Bring me liquor!
[Adufe in English] Ishaya.
Wait.
[in Pidgin] What's up?
You and Oga Rambo?
What's wrong with you? What do you think you're doing?
translation.fr:
Tu as perdu la tête ?
Qu'est-ce que tu fabriques ?

translation.en: You don't get to ask me that after you treated me like that.
translation.fr:
Me parle comme ça
après la façon dont tu m'as traitée.

translation.en: -Huh? -How did I treat you?
[in English] See, for your information, Oga Rambo, he has treated me better than you ever did, you hear me?
translation.fr:
Pour ta gouverne, Oga Rambo
me traite mieux que toi.

translation.en: [in Pidgin] Have you ever asked me what I want out of life?
translation.fr:
Tu m'as déjà demandé
ce que je voulais dans la vie ?

translation.en: You don't think I deserve it, but I do.
translation.fr:
Tu ne penses pas que je le mérite,
mais tu as tort.

translation.en: [in English] Rubbish.
[Ishaya] Sir, a customer wants to change money. Get ten bundles, put it in that bag.
translation.fr:
- Le client veut changer de l'argent.
- Mets dix liasses, dans ce sac.

translation.en: Nine, ten.
[Ijoba] We need new market for the molly ASAP.
translation.fr:
Il nous faut un nouveau marché
pour la MD.

translation.en: [Essien on video] You have been selected as one of my apprentices in London.
translation.fr:
Vous avez été choisi
comme apprenti à Londres.

translation.en: [Ishaya] Look, I'm too busy following my own dreams.
translation.fr:
Je suis occupé
à suivre mes propres rêves.

translation.en: Will it take you a million years to count ten fucking bundles?
translation.fr: Tu es lent pour compter dix liasses.

translation.en: Sorry. Sorry, sir. I'm done.
[in Yoruba] You're obsessed with music. All day long, it's music! Why?
translation.fr:
Tu es obsédé par la musique.
Tu ne fais que ça à longueur de journée.

translation.en: [in English] Here.
What's this?
Wilmer entrance exam answers.
translation.fr: Les réponses de l'examen de Wilmer.

translation.en: But, Daddy, I can pass it on my own.
One thing I've always wanted,
to be the managing director of Five Star Realty,
translation.fr:
d'être directeur d'une agence immobilière
cinq étoiles,

translation.en: selling mansions to billionaires.
translation.fr: de vendre des villas à des milliardaires.

translation.en: And you know where those billionaires are? Wilmer Academy.
translation.fr:
Et tu sais où sont ces milliardaires ?
À la Wilmer Academy.

translation.en: I need you to memorize those answers,
get in, help me get rich.
translation.fr:
Il faut que tu sois accepté
et m'aides à devenir riche.

translation.en: With a scholarship, there's no school fees.
translation.fr:
Avec une bourse,
il n'y a pas de frais de scolarité.

translation.en: And $10,000 award.
So, cram those answers.
Capisce?
Capisce.
Sorry, sir.
Cleaner boy, wait!
I threw something away by mistake.
translation.fr: J'ai jeté un truc par erreur.

translation.en: Open the bag.
What are you looking for now? Shut up. Don't ask such stupid questions.
translation.fr:
- Vous cherchez quoi ?
- Pose pas de questions stupides.

translation.en: -[Ishaya] Lala. -Hmm?
What if I told you I had the answers to Wilmer entrance exams?
translation.fr:
J'ai les réponses
de l'examen d'entrée de Wilmer.

translation.en: 100% guaranteed, you'd get the scholarship.
I still don't have the money for the test. What if I told you I had the money for the test too?
translation.fr:
- Je n'ai pas l'argent pour l'inscription.
- J'ai l'argent aussi.

translation.en: I don't think I want to go there by cheating.
translation.fr:
Je veux pas tricher.
Je veux mériter d'y étudier,

translation.en: It only means I don't deserve to be there, so, no.
translation.fr:
Je veux pas tricher.
Je veux mériter d'y étudier, donc c'est non.

translation.en: [in Pidgin] You know how much the top student wins?
translation.fr: Tu sais combien le meilleur élève gagne ?

translation.en: How much? A million?
Six million.
Look at you, I've already registered with 150,000.
translation.fr: Je me suis déjà inscrit pour 150 000.

translation.en: Where'd you get the money? Why are you stealing Rahila's dream?
translation.fr: Pourquoi tu voles le rêve de Rahila ?

translation.en: I asked her, she said she won't cheat to achieve her dream.
translation.fr: Elle veut pas tricher à l'examen.

translation.en: [in English] Me, I'll do anything to get my dream.
translation.fr:
Moi, je ferais tout
pour réaliser mon rêve.

translation.en: [in Pidgin] Understand?
Here, help me learn the answers.
[in English] Number one, B. Number two, C. Number three…
translation.fr:
Réponse un, B.
Réponse deux, C. Réponse trois…

translation.en: Thirty-eight, D. Thirty-nine…
Forty-one, C.
[woman] You have 90 minutes. You may begin.
[woman] Face forward.
-[phone chimes] -[chatter continues loudly on TV]
[Michael exclaiming] My guy!
The best education in Africa.
Thank you for choosing Wilmer Academy.
translation.fr: Merci d'avoir choisi la Wilmer Academy.

translation.en: What do you think?
I think that was pretty good.
You're coming, right?
I have to go to church with my mom, but I'll come over later. Okay?
translation.fr:
Je dois aller à l'église avec ma mère,
je passerai plus tard.

translation.en: -Good luck! Bye! -Ugh.
[woman on PA] The Wilmer Academy Open Day is a proud tradition that goes back 20 years,
translation.fr:
La journée portes ouvertes est
une tradition qui remonte à 20 ans.

translation.en: where our leaders of tomorrow experience Wilmer for the first time as scholars.
translation.fr:
Nos futurs leaders vivront l'école
en tant qu'étudiants.

translation.en: After registration,
please make your way into the auditorium, where the program will commence.
translation.fr:
rendez-vous à l'auditorium
pour la présentation du programme d'art.

translation.en: Thank you.
Excuse me a second.
Ishaya Bello?
I am Principal Gemade.
[muffled] Pleased to meet you, ma'am.
[sighs] I'll see you after the tour.
translation.fr: On se voit après la visite.

translation.en: [muttering angrily] Stuffing your face…
translation.fr: Arrête de te goinfrer et parle aux gens.

translation.en: Principal Gemade, meet my son.
I'm sorry,
Carmen.
Next time,
don't touch,
Ishaya.
-Mum. -Where have you been?
-I-- -Here. Your speech.
Just read it like you mean it.
Here.
Smile. Let's go.
[Gemade] And I know this year will be one of the best years
translation.fr:
Cette année s'annonce prometteuse
et restera gravée

translation.en: Wilmer Academy has ever seen.
translation.fr: dans les annale de la Wilmer Academy.

translation.en: [Gemade] Without further ado,
I'd like to call on the great-granddaughter of the founder
to welcome her fellow students to the new academic year.
translation.fr:
avec un discours de bienvenue
pour cette rentrée.

translation.en: Good afternoon.
My name is Carmen Wilmer Willoughby.
-I'm a descendant of the founding father. -This babe is fine!
translation.fr:
- Je suis descendante du fondateur.
- Elle est canon.

translation.en: Sorry, but I don't see it.
It's an honor to welcome you all to the new academic session.
translation.fr:
C'est un honneur
de vous souhaiter la bienvenue.

translation.en: And anyone who dates Atlas is definitely not a good person.
translation.fr:
Quiconque sort avec Atlas
n'est pas quelqu'un de bien.

translation.en: Atlas?
What, like the map of the world?
Thank you.
[Gemade] Now, before the tour,
I'd like to introduce someone special.
translation.fr:
j'aimerais vous présenter
une personne importante.

translation.en: This year, we started a scholarship program,
translation.fr:
Cette année, nous avons lancé
une bourse d'étudiants,

translation.en: which is sponsored by Pastor Okolo.
Allow me to introduce
the first recipient who had a perfect score.
translation.fr: le candidat qui a fait un sans-faute.

translation.en: Ishaya Bello.
[Frank] I can't believe you're the scholarship student. I came second in the exam.
translation.fr:
Dire que c'est toi, le boursier.
J'ai fini deuxième à l'examen.

translation.en: We need to talk.
Hey. You want a picture with the scholarship student, right? Come back, I'm busy.
translation.fr:
Tu veux une photo avec la star ?
Reviens, je suis occupé.

translation.en: -How dare you! -[Carmen clears throat]
Can I have your attention?
[Ishaya] Let's go.
[Atlas] Put this thing on the wall properly now.
translation.fr:
Tu vois bien
qu'il est mal accroché.

translation.en: -That's now how you-- -[Carmen] Atlas! Hey, babe.
[Atlas] Hey.
-[Atlas] How are you? -I'm okay.
-[Atlas] How's the tour going? -Frustrating.
translation.fr:
- La visite se passe bien ?
- Frustrante.

translation.en: Guys, this is--
Frankincense!
Is that you I smell?
Atlas, we're too old for this.
translation.fr: Atlas. On est trop vieux pour ça.

translation.en: Come on, babe.
He clearly missed me.
That's why he followed me all the way to Wilmer, right?
translation.fr:
C'est pour ça
qu'il m'a suivi jusqu'à Wilmer, hein ?

translation.en: My name is… I'm Frank.
Yes, but the full thing is Frankincense, right?
-Frankincense-- -[Ishaya] Hey, hey.
[in Pidgin] Madam Tour Guide, can we focus on why we're here?
[in English] Or is your boyfriend what we're here to see?
translation.fr: ou on est là pour voir votre petit ami ?

translation.en: Let's go.
FYI, the name is Carmen.
translation.fr: Pour info, je m'appelle Carmen, et c'est par ici.

translation.en: And it's this way.
translation.fr: je m'appelle Carmen, et c'est par ici.

translation.en: Put this thing on the wall properly now.
And this is the brand-new art gallery.
translation.fr: Et voici le nouvel atelier de dessin.

translation.en: [Patricia] You drew this? I want to be an artist, Mummy, like Daddy.
translation.fr:
- C'est toi qui as dessiné ça ?
- Je veux être artiste, comme papa.

translation.en: [Patricia] But you know art is forbidden in this house.
translation.fr: L'art est interdit dans cette maison.

translation.en: Daddy! Daddy!
Let me guess. Artist.
How did you know?
You really need to learn how not to touch without permission.
translation.fr:
Tu dois apprendre
à ne pas toucher sans permission.

translation.en: This way.
Can I get it now?
As soon as we receive your transcript from your secondary school.
translation.fr:
Dès qu'on aura reçu
votre relevé de notes de votre lycée.

translation.en: Transcript?
School resumes next week Monday, so please bring it to us by then.
translation.fr:
L'école reprend lundi prochain,
veillez à me le faire parvenir avant.

translation.en: [man] I thought you were so stupid you couldn't memorize the answers,
translation.fr:
Je te croyais incapable
de mémoriser les réponses.

translation.en: but you're even more stupid, 'cause you threw it away, and now the cleaner's son got the scholarship.
translation.fr:
Mais tu es encore plus bête.
Tu l'as jeté et le larbin a eu la bourse.

translation.en: I wanted to prove that I could do it on my own.
translation.fr:
Je voulais prouver
que je pouvais y arriver.

translation.en: You are an idiot if you think anyone can achieve anything honestly in this world!
translation.fr:
Personne n'accomplit quoi que ce soit
honnêtement en ce monde !

translation.en: [in Yoruba] Get out of my sight!
[in English] Get the hell out of my sight. Nonsense.
[in Yoruba] Just look at him.
-[in English] Hey, Patricia. -Hello, sir.
You are fired!
Sir, please…
Go and ask that thief you call a son.
translation.fr: Allez demander à votre voleur de fils.

translation.en: [Ishaya in Pidgin] Bro AB, I know I owe you money. Please, just let me run this package.
translation.fr:
Je sais que je te dois de l'argent.
Laisse-moi gérer ce colis.

translation.en: [in English] Whatever it is, my answer is no.
[in Pidgin] My guy, please, this is very important.
translation.fr: S'il te plaît, c'est très important.

translation.en: -I said no! -[Michael] Guy, calm down!
Please, it's just this document I need help with.
translation.fr: J'ai besoin d'aide pour un document.

translation.en: Replace her name with mine.
translation.fr: Remplace son nom par le mien.

translation.en: -[AB] It'll cost 50K. -Jesus!
translation.fr:
Ça va te coûter 50 000. - Quoi ?
- 50 000, c'est trop pour ça.

translation.en: 50K is too much for this!
[AB in English] Wait.
[Ishaya in Pidgin] I don't have 50K.
[in English] Take.
[in Pidgin] I'm pleading with you, as soon as you get the scholarship money, return it, because it's my office contribution.
translation.fr:
Dès que tu auras les sous de la bourse,
rends-le-moi, c'est à mes collègues.

translation.en: -I don't want problems. -Mike…
translation.fr:
- Je veux pas de problèmes.
- Mike…

translation.en: I beg you in the name of God.
[in English] Thank you.
[Atlas] Mum, this is the tenth time I'm calling you. Call me back.
translation.fr:
Maman, c'est la dixième fois
que je t'appelle. Rappelle-moi.

translation.en: I can't apply for the London Art Institute grant if my school fees aren't paid.
translation.fr:
Je peux pas postuler à l'Institut d'Art
de Londres sans payer les frais.

translation.en: I can't keep living at Reggie's house.
translation.fr: Je peux plus vivre chez Reggie.

translation.en: It's like I'm homeless.
Call me back.
[man in Yoruba] Baby.
Can you imagine that useless man named Allen…
-Uh-huh? -[in English] You know, his school is now participating in the London Art Institute grant?
translation.fr:
Son école participe à la bourse
de l'Institut d'Art de Londres.

translation.en: -I thought that was exclusive to us. -Apparently not.
translation.fr:
- Ça nous était réservé.
- Apparemment pas.

translation.en: [Atlas] Good morning.
-[Mrs. Willoughby] Oh, Atlas! -I see you have a new Essien on your wall.
translation.fr:
- Bonjour.
- Atlas ! Vous avez un nouvel Essien au mur.

translation.en: One day very soon, we'll have an Atlas original when you win the grant.
translation.fr:
Très bientôt, on aura un original d'Atlas
quand tu auras la bourse.

translation.en: -[maid] Miss Carmen. -What?
Your friend has come to carry you to school, so Mummy said--
translation.fr:
Votre ami est venu vous chercher.
Votre mère…

translation.en: Tell Mummy to come now!
-You mean I should tell her-- -Tell her to come now!
translation.fr:
- Je lui dis…
- De venir tout de suite !

translation.en: [Mrs. Willoughby] Uh, excuse me.
-I'll be right back. -[Mr. Willoughby] Oh, dear.
So, Atlas, how's your mother?
translation.fr: Alors, Atlas, comment va ta mère ?

translation.en: Uh, she's good.
Good.
[Mrs. Willoughby] What's going on here?
Give it to me!
You don't need any more painkillers. Only people in pain need it.
translation.fr:
Tu n'as plus besoin d'antidouleurs.
Tu n'as pas mal.

translation.en: Even Dr. Olaoye says you don't need pills.
translation.fr:
Le Dr Olaoye dit
que tu n'en as plus besoin.

translation.en: -It's been a year-- -Neither you nor her shattered your leg!
translation.fr:
- Ça fait un an…
- Vous ne vous êtes pas brisé la jambe !

translation.en: [Mrs. Willoughby] Enough!
People are watching, waiting for you to have a breakdown.
translation.fr: On nous observe, on attend que tu craques.

translation.en: You're a Wilmer Willoughby, my daughter.
translation.fr: Tu es une Wilmer Willoughby, ma fille.

translation.en: So chin up and smile!
translation.fr: Alors lève la tête et souris.

translation.en: It feels like I have no control over my life.
translation.fr: Je n'ai aucun contrôle sur ma vie.

translation.en: She even took my painkillers. I don't get it.
translation.fr: Elle a pris mes médocs. Je pige pas.

translation.en: Is it her pain? Ugh. I can't wait to leave this house.
translation.fr:
C'est pas elle qui souffre.
J'ai hâte de partir.

translation.en: Babe, take it easy.
In two years,
you and I'll be eating caviar and drinking champagne along the Thames.
translation.fr:
tu mangeras du caviar et boiras
du champagne sur la Tamise.

translation.en: -Mum! Finally! I've been trying to-- -[woman] Hello, Atlas.
translation.fr:
- Maman ! Enfin ! J'ai essayé…
- Bonjour, Atlas.

translation.en: Your mother is still in Paris. She'll give you a call later.
translation.fr:
Votre mère est toujours à Paris.
Elle vous rappellera.

translation.en: -Babe, are you okay? What's wrong? -[tires squealing]
-[engine revving] -[shrieks] Atlas, stop!
I'm sorry.
I'm sorry. I'm sorry, baby.
I have to get someone to call your school's records office
translation.fr:
On doit appeler
l'administration de votre lycée

translation.en: to verify this.
Verify?
The thing is, the school, their phone lines are down.
translation.fr:
Le problème, c'est que les lignes
téléphoniques ne marchent pas.

translation.en: So they gave me, um, a phone number that you can call in case you need to verify.
translation.fr:
Ils m'ont donné un numéro
en cas de vérification.

translation.en: Sorry. Just write it down for you here.
translation.fr: Désolé. Je vous le note ici.

translation.en: -This guy. Fuckin' pick up. -[line ringing]
If it isn't the royal couple of Wilmer Academy.
translation.fr:
Si ce n'est pas le couple royal
de la Wilmer Academy.

translation.en: Car, you ready for your welcome back party this weekend?
translation.fr:
Prête pour ta fête en ton honneur
ce week-end ?

translation.en: Why? Oh, my bad! It was a surprise?
translation.fr:
- Pourquoi ?
- Oh non. C'était une surprise ?

translation.en: [laughs] Surprise.
[Atlas] Babe, I can cancel if it's too much.
translation.fr: Je peux annuler si c'est trop.

translation.en: [sighs] No. It's probably what I need.
translation.fr: Non. Ça va me faire du bien.

translation.en: [Nen] Yes, Mummy.
May God be with you too as we accomplish His new mission.
translation.fr:
Que Dieu nous protège
et nous accompagne dans notre mission.

translation.en: Amen.
Crazy.
Now that we are all gathered together,
I have a very special "Welcome back to Wilmer" package just for you, Car.
translation.fr:
j'ai un cadeau de bienvenue
pour fêter ton retour parmi nous.

translation.en: -[Nen] Where's that? -To the shrine?
[laughs] Mmm, to the shrine!
-[knocking] -[man] Occupied. Fuck off!
Bro, this shit smells different.
translation.fr: Mec, ce n'est pas la même came.

translation.en: Yeah, man, I got the Holy Grail of kush all for Car's first day.
translation.fr:
J'ai eu de la bonne
pour fêter le retour de Carmen.

translation.en: Step outside, please.
Ma?
My secretary has your uniforms and schedule.
translation.fr:
Pour votre uniforme
et emploi du temps.

translation.en: The transcript?
Verified.
Um, so, my prize money, where is it?
-You mean the grant. -Yes.
translation.fr:
- Vous voulez dire la bourse.
- Oui.

translation.en: You can collect it at the end of the day from the bursar.
translation.fr:
Récupérez-le en fin de journée
à l'administration.

translation.en: Oh, thank you.
Car, baby, no.
You should know better.
Good thing secondhand smoking is a thing, so just breathe in, Car, baby.
translation.fr:
Sois fumeuse passive, tu seras
un peu perchée, mais ça ira, "bébé".

translation.en: -[smacks lips] -[Nen] So what's your problem?
If this is about last week, I told you, I had a church thing.
translation.fr:
La semaine dernière,
je devais aller à l'église.

translation.en: Nen, this is about the last few months,
translation.fr: Non, je parle de ces derniers mois.

translation.en: and a quick puff-puff-pass is not going to fix it.
translation.fr:
Une petite fumette
ne va pas tout arranger.

translation.en: Can you guys please not fuck up my high?
Exactly.
Let's just go to class.
Is that shit because I'm a year behind now?
translation.fr:
- C'est parce que j'ai un an de retard ?
- Purée, Carmen.

translation.en: Good God, Carmen. Reggie, please, light one up for this girl.
translation.fr:
- C'est parce que j'ai un an de retard ?
- Purée, Carmen. Reggie, file-lui un joint.
Faut qu'elle se détende.

translation.en: She needs to chill.
translation.fr:
Reggie, file-lui un joint.
Faut qu'elle se détende.

translation.en: Babe, you think maybe it's because of the pills?
translation.fr: Tu crois que c'est à cause des médocs ?

translation.en: What pills?
[Reggie] Fuck.
[Atlas] Leave.
-Are you deaf? I said get the-- -[Nen] Hey, let's go.
translation.fr:
- Tu es sourd ? Je t'ai dit…
- Allez.

translation.en: Hey, don't be a snitch.
Just for today.
[teacher] Simile, metaphor…
Can I help you?
I'm Ishaya Bello. I'm new.
translation.fr: Je suis Ishaya Bello. Je suis nouveau.

translation.en: Everyone is, and no one else is late, Mr. Scholarship.
translation.fr:
Tout le monde l'est
et personne n'est en retard, M. Boursier.

translation.en: Can you get somewhere to sit?
As I was saying,
alliteration, irony.
Who can tell me the ninth one?
I have listed eight out of nine…
translation.fr: J'en ai cité huit sur neuf…

translation.en: Do you like Carmen?
You were drawing her.
Here.
-For helping me tie my tie. -[woman exclaims] Oh, my God.
translation.fr: Pour m'avoir aidé avec ma cravate. Purée.

translation.en: You drew this in 40 minutes? Well, 20, actually.
translation.fr:
- Tu as dessiné ça en 40 min ?
- 20, en fait.

translation.en: Hi.
I'm Zina. I know you're Ishaya. And you are?
translation.fr:
Zina. Je sais que tu es Ishaya.
Et toi ?

translation.en: I'm Denrele.
-I wasn't talking to you. -Me?
translation.fr:
- Denrele.
- Je te parlais pas. Moi ?

translation.en: I'm Frank. Frank Abok.
[Zina] Hi, it's nice to meet you guys.
Today we're going to discuss the plans for the semester,
translation.fr:
Aujourd'hui, on va discuter
des projets du semestre,

translation.en: so no need for your pencils.
This year we're also doing something very different
translation.fr:
Cette année, on fait
quelque chose de différent

translation.en: for the London Art Institute grant.
translation.fr:
pour la bourse
de l'Institut d'Art de Londres.

translation.en: Now, everyone can participate, but only three students,
translation.fr:
Chacun peut participer,
mais seuls trois élèves,

translation.en: one from your year and two from the second year,
translation.fr:
un de votre année
et deux de 2e année,

translation.en: will be submitting directly to the London Art Institute.
translation.fr:
postuleront directement
à l'Institut d'Art de Londres.

translation.en: Now, to select the students, I will be giving you all an assignment.
translation.fr:
Pour sélectionner les élèves,
je vais vous donner un devoir.

translation.en: Deadline is next Thursday.
You're very talented.
I look forward to seeing your submission for the shortlist.
translation.fr: J'ai hâte de voir votre projet.

translation.en: I don't think I'll be submitting anything.
After removing the cost of books and uniform,
translation.fr: Après le coût des livres et de l'uniforme,

translation.en: your balance is now 5,000 naira.
Sir?
Five thousand what?
[in Pidgin] Michael, I was given 5,000 naira.
I was given 5,000 naira, what do I do?
What do I do?
[Ishaya in English] Jesus.
[Ijoba in Yoruba] Don't you know
I'm from the streets?
translation.fr: que je suis de la rue ?

translation.en: [in English] Rambo's family…
took me in and raised me.
When his mother died,
we were left on our own,
hustling on the streets.
You can ask your father, who knew us before we started our business
translation.fr:
Tu peux demander à ton père qui nous connaît
depuis bien avant notre business.

translation.en: that earned us our respect.
translation.fr:
qui nous connaît
depuis bien avant notre business.

translation.en: Then you have the…
temerity…
to steal 150,000 naira from us.
[in Yoruba] You think we are so stupid that we don't have cameras
translation.fr:
Tu nous crois assez bêtes pour ne pas avoir de caméras
dans la salle avec l'argent ?

translation.en: in the money room?
translation.fr:
pour ne pas avoir de caméras
dans la salle avec l'argent ?

translation.en: [in English] Brother Government, Brother Rambo, please, I'll pay you--
translation.fr:
Ijoba, Rambo, s'il vous plaît,
je vous rembourserai.

translation.en: [in Pidgin] Please, I'll pay you back, I just need a little time.
translation.fr:
Je vous rembourserai,
j'ai juste besoin de temps.

translation.en: Please, a little time-- [Ijoba in Yoruba] Government, Angel is hungry.
translation.fr:
- Un peu de temps.
- Angel a faim.

translation.en: Let's feed him to her.
translation.fr: On n'a qu'à la lui filer.

translation.en: [Oga Rambo] Don't call me that!
That's not my name.
[in English] I'm sorry, Oga Rambo.
Please. I beg you.
[Ishaya sobs in Pidgin] I'll pay you back, I just need just a little time.
translation.fr:
Je vous rembourserai,
j'ai juste besoin de temps.

translation.en: [in English] Please. Please.
Please. Please, sir. Please.
You have one week.
Or your sister will clear your debt in our private rooms.
translation.fr:
Ou ta sœur paiera ta dette
en dansant dans ma boîte.

translation.en: No. No, take me, I'll follow you.
Leave my daughter.
[in Yoruba] Woman, no man will pay anything to look at you.
translation.fr: Aucun homme ne paiera pour te regarder.

translation.en: [Ishaya in Pidgin] Please, please, I'll pay the money. I just need time.
translation.fr:
Je vous rembourserai.
J'ai juste besoin de temps.

translation.en: [Rahila sobs in English] We'll pay your money back, sir, please.
translation.fr:
On va se débrouiller
pour vous rembourser.

translation.en: Mummy, don't let them take me! Leave me!
translation.fr:
Ne les laissez pas m'emmener !
Laissez-moi !

translation.en: -[shrieks] Leave me! Leave me! -My daughter! My daughter!
-Please, sir! No, don't take her, please! -[Rahila screams] No!
[Ishaya] Mummy, Mummy, Mummy! Don't follow them!
-[Rahila] Mummy! -[Ishaya] Don't follow them.
[Oga Rambo in Yoruba] Crazy people, leave my sight.
translation.fr:
Bande de fous,
hors de ma vue.

translation.en: [in English] I'll pay you back your money. Mr. Government, please!
translation.fr: Je vous rembourserai. Je vous en prie !

translation.en: [angrily] You did this… so fix it!
Go look for their money and pay them.
[Patricia] Ishaya, get out of this house now!
